data.eml:eml: The Oriental flat bug genus Libiocoris Kormilev, 1957 revisited: re-examination, synonymy, and description of a new genus (Heteroptera, Aradidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bai, Xiaoshuan, Heiss, Ernst, Cai, Wanzhi (2018): The Oriental flat bug genus Libiocoris Kormilev, 1957 revisited: re-examination, synonymy, and description of a new genus (Heteroptera, Aradidae). ZooKeys 789: 115-137, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.26165, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.789.26165
